subject: Public Speaking
title: Pacing Your Speech
description: A quick, practical guide to Pacing Your Speech.

hook.text: Speed creates excitement. Slowness creates drama. Vary both.

buildup.text: The middle of speeches often drags. Plan pacing deliberately.

discovery.text: Faster sections work for action and energy. Slower for emotion.

twist.text: Pacing variation keeps audiences engaged through long speeches.

climax.text: Write pacing notes into your script. Don't leave it to chance.

punchline.text: Pace deliberately. Don't let tempo drift.
